https://places.singleplatform.com/zamaan-cafe-0/menu 11/11

Description: Hummus, pita wraps & falafel round out the menu at this Middle Eastern eatery serving classic fare.

summary.snippet: "We got Combo for 2 (Tawook, kafta, falafel, hummus, rice, pita bread, salad)."
"Tasty food, served quickly, for a good price."
"The chicken shawarma pita wrap was soooo good and full of garlic sauce."

most_relevant.description:
Excellent authentic Lebanese cuisine. The chicken shawarma pita wrap was soooo good and full of garlic sauce.
I also tried the ginger hummus which was a delightful combination of excellent hummus with shredded raw ginger on top

Great place to stop into as you drive through Ann Arbor! Service was friendly and quick, and plenty of cool areas to sit inside.

The Shish Tawook was absolutely delicious. Chicken was cooked perfectly and the flavor was incredible! The rice with a hint of sumac was a great side.

Highly recommend Zamaan Cafe!

The food was really good, good option and flavorful. The restaurant looks closed, or like it should be because the lights are falling from the ceiling, the ceiling tiles are stained from water leaks, sign is broken and stuff piled up outside. Service was ok, had to go in and get my food because they only brought part of it out to us.

Was driving across Michigan and found this spot outside of Ann Arbor. You walk in and order at the counter, the menu is easy to read and the worker gave us great recommendations.

The Shish Tawook were juicy marinated chunks of chicken breast served with rice, garlic sauce and pita bread. Eating all 3 together was so amazing!  I also ordered a half Fattoush Salad that was HUGE for only being a half salad.

We had delicious food from Uncle Ali and the fabulous staff at Zamaan Cafe.  Tawook and Kufta were excellent as well as the grape leaves, rice and Fattoush salad.  I Highly recommend dining  in or take out from Zamaan Cafe for authentic Lebanese cuisine.   Mom said the  grape leaves were the best she had ever had eaten. The Tawook chicken was the best chicken I have ever tasted.  Thank you Uncle Ali !!

The food was delicious. It's basically take out service. There are some tables, but I didn't get the impression they're cleaned too often. This place proves the adage that dives have the best food. No, at your table waitstaff. You order at the counter, and the front counter person brings the food to you.
Most of the business was as stated, take out, and lots of food was seen exciting the door!  I'd rather have good food with a mediocre atmosphere than bad food with a great atmosphere.  You choose.

Ordered delivery and everything was superb! I was especially impressed with how tasty their hummus was. I got the Ginger hummus and Fulful hummus (spicy) and both were outstanding. I enjoyed the falafel wrap and stuffed grape leaves as well. Will definitely have again!

I got the meat shawarma wrap and my hubs got the riz bi dajaj wrap combo style with rice. Oh ma gash! It was absolutely delicious! We both agreed the meat shawarma was good -but the riz di dajaj was HEAVEN! Think chicken shawarma plus garlic sauce plus rice plus a few pickles to cut the fat. I wish we lived closer! Staff was friendly and we’ll definitely return when we’re in the area again!
